properties.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 11 at 3:03AM EST until January 12 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Burlington VT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy freezing rain with significant icing expected. Ice
accumulations of four tenths to three quarters of an inch.

* WHERE...Grand Isle and Western Franklin Counties.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the
ice. Travel could be very difficult Saturday night into Sunday
owing to icy roads.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to freezing rain tonight
as winds shift into the north and temperatures fall below
freezing. Freezing rain will be moderate to heavy at times
overnight into Sunday morning. Precipitation may end as a brief
period of snow.
properties.instruction:
Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra
flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an
emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.

Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

NWSheadline: ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY
